bibl.title: with contributions by Brian P. MUHS and Steve VINSON, Catalog of Demotic Texts in the Brooklyn Museum.
bibl.note: P. Brooklyn dem. (O. Brooklyn dem., T. Brooklyn dem.) 1-213. - Inscribed Wooden Pieces (1-7). - Inscribed Stone Pieces (8-10). - Papyri (11-56). - Ostraca (57-204). - Additional Texts (205-213). - Includes a few bilingual texts (Demotic and Greek). The parts in Greek have been edited in P. Brooklyn by John C. SHELTON. - Available online (PDF), without charge: < http://oi.uchicago.edu/OI/DEPT/PUB/SRC/OIC/29/OIC29.html >.
bibl.seg: 141.12 / 141.4 P. Brooklyn dem. 142.12 / 142.4 O. Brooklyn dem. 143.12 / 143.4 T. Brooklyn dem.
HUGHES George R. †, with contributions by Brian P. MUHS and Steve VINSON, Catalog of Demotic Texts in the Brooklyn Museum. (Oriental Institute Communications. 29.)
Chicago, Illinois, The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, 2005, 4°, xx-115 pp., front. et 48 pll. dont 8 coul. ISBN 1-885923-27-9. $75.

P. Brooklyn dem. (O. Brooklyn dem., T. Brooklyn dem.) 1-213. - Inscribed Wooden Pieces (1-7). - Inscribed Stone Pieces (8-10). - Papyri (11-56). - Ostraca (57-204). - Additional Texts (205-213). - Includes a few bilingual texts (Demotic and Greek). The parts in Greek have been edited in P. Brooklyn by John C. SHELTON. - Available online (PDF), without charge: < http://oi.uchicago.edu/OI/DEPT/PUB/SRC/OIC/29/OIC29.html >.
C.R. par Didier Devauchelle, JESHO 50 (2007) pp. 83-85. - Günter Vittmann, Enchoria 30 (2006/2007 [2009]) pp. 163-167.
